title: Foundation: A/Ls and Degree
description: Any A/L stream is acceptable. A bachelor's degree in Human Resource Management, Business Administration, or Psychology provides a strong theoretical foundation for a career in HR.

title: Professional Qualification & Internship
description: Enroll in a professional HR qualification from CIPM Sri Lanka (Chartered Institute of Personnel Management). Gain practical experience through an internship in an HR department, where you'll be exposed to the day-to-day functions.
qualifications: PQHRM (Professional Qualification in Human Resource Management) from CIPM

title: HR Executive / Officer
description: Work in an entry-level HR role, handling operational tasks. You may focus on a specific area like recruitment (talent acquisition), payroll, or employee relations. This is where you build your core HR skills.
institutes: All large to medium-sized companies in Sri Lanka

title: Assistant HR Manager / HR Business Partner
description: Advance to a more strategic role. As an Assistant HR Manager, you'll oversee a team or a specific HR function. As an HR Business Partner (HRBP), you'll work closely with specific business units to align HR strategy with their goals.
